headline: Bentley Systems, CrowdStrike, and PTC Shares Skyrocket, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks jumped in the afternoon session after President Donald Trump eased concerns over escalating trade tensions with China, calming markets rattled by his earlier tariff threats.

headline: PTC Appoints James A. Lico to Board of Directors
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that it has appointed James (Jim) Lico to its Board of Directors, effective October 13, 2025.
